Japan: Nihon Montoku Tennō Jitsuroku (5th volume of historical chronicles Rikkokushi) was completed.
Germany: Carloman of Bavaria was incapacitated, probably by a stroke.
Carloman of Bavaria abdicated Bavaria and Italy to his brothers Louis the Younger and Charles the Fat, respectively.
France: Louis the Stammerer dies of illness. His two sons Louis III and Carloman II succeed him as joint kings of West Francia.
China: Guangzhou massacre: The rebel Huang Chao burned and looted Guangzhou and killed as many as two hundred thousand foreigners, mainly Arabs and Persians.
